TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool DataSourceViewOperationCallback(int recordsAffected, Exception exception);

remarks.para: By default, ASP.NET Web page and control execution is synchronous. However, data source controls can be extended to support asynchronous data retrieval and data operations. The object supports the , , and methods for asynchronous data processing. The delegate is passed to the data source view by a data-bound control, so that the view can call this delegate when asynchronous processing is complete and notify the data-bound control of the operation's outcome.

summary.para: Represents the asynchronous callback method that a data-bound control supplies to a data source view for asynchronous insert, update, or delete data operations.
